StringProperty.Name: PreBuildCommand
StringProperty.Description: Specifies a command line for the pre-build event tool to run.

StringProperty.Name: PreBuildMessage
StringProperty.Description: Specifies a description for the pre-build event tool to display.

BoolProperty.Name: PreBuildEventUseInBuild
BoolProperty.Description: Specifies whether this build event is excluded from the build for the current configuration.

StringListProperty.Name: PreBuildAdditionalSourcesToCopyMapping
StringListProperty.Description: Specifies additional files to copy to the remote system. Optionally the list can be provided as a local to remote mapping pairs using a syntax like this: fulllocalpath1:=fullremotepath1;fulllocalpath2:=fullremotepath2, where a local file can be copied to the specified remote location on the remote system.
